// {{{ NX.Function.pass

/**
 * @class NX.Function
 */

/**
 * @method pass
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(fn, args, scope) {

    if(args) {
        args = NX.Array.from(args);
    } else {
        args = [];
    }

    return function() {
        return fn.apply(scope, args.concat(NX.Array.toArray(arguments)));
    };
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
